Block.Text: {C1}{Char:0206}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}But we live to fight another day. We'll be back!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Phew! You sure saved the day back there!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Well, I don't think we'll be seeing them again. They won't fancy another pounding like that one!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thank you so much. Please, take this.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Item received: |02,64,64{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You have been defeated by the thieves.{End}
{C1}{Char:0207}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Hehehe! You should have just stayed out of our way! Right, we'll be taking that |02,64,64{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0206}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}And getting out of here! Goodbye!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Th-They sure were scary...{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Why those no-good... Are you all right, |02,50,65{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}An item was stolen: |02,64,64{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1038}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}H-Help!{End}
{C1}{Char:0206}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Hey, you, stop!{End}
{C1}{Char:1038}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}No...! |02,50,65{C1}! Please, help me! Those awful people have kidnapped my darling {Color:32}Lilligant{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0207}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Heh! If you want her back, hand over that item!{End}
{C1}{Char:1038}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You rescued me! Thank you ever so much! Come on, {Color:32}Lilligant{Color:33}, say thank you!{End}
{C1}{Char:1038}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Please accept this as a small token of my gratitude.{End}
{C1}{Char:0206}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}Heh! Well, we got what we wanted, so you can have {Color:32}Lilligant{Color:33} back! Bye for now!{End}

{C1}{Char:1038}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thank you, |02,50,65{C1}... We may have lost material goods, but at least my darling {Color:32}Lilligant{Color:33} came back safely. That's the most important thing. Thank you again.{End}
{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Th-This is terrible! Terrible! A gang of bandits has stolen our |02,64,64{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}We were supposed to be guarding it... Forgive us!{End}
{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I'm so sorry... What should we do, |02,50,65{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You must defeat the bandits to recover the stolen |02,64,64{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You did it! You got our |02,64,64{C1} back!{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thank you! You are truly magnificent, |02,50,65{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,64,64{C1} recovered.{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Those dastardly bandits... They'll pay for this next time!{End}
{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I'm sorry, |02,50,65{C1}... I won't let this happen again.{End}
{C1}{Char:1038}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh! My precious |02,64,64{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Get it back.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Let them go.{End}
{C1}{Char:1050}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Ohhh... I really am sorry...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Punish.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Forgive.{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}B-But I... No...!{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Hey! You're one of those {Color:32}legendary Pokémon{Color:33}, aren't you?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}You look pretty tough―just as I hoped!{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}I can tell you and I are going to do some real damage together!{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:34}Are you...the {Color:32}legendary Pokémon{Color:33} {Color:31}Articuno{Color:33}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}You're...beautiful. And you look so...strong... Never before have I seen such a magnificent Pokémon...{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}With you, I would become even stronger... I beseech you, {Color:31}Articuno{Color:33}, do battle alongside me!{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The power of the crystal... I had no idea it had anything to do with a {Color:32}legendary Pokémon{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}And yet... Your round shape... There is something about you that speaks to me...{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Allow me to use your power, {Color:31}Registeel{Color:33}. We shall travel this world together...{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Oh! Such unbridled power...! This is why you are known as a {Color:32}legendary Pokémon{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}With your help, {Color:31}Groudon{Color:33}, I can become even stronger!{End}
{C1}{Char:0010}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Now then... Let's go!{End}
{C1}{Char:0031}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}So this is the legendary power of the {Color:32}Warrior Crystal{Color:33}... I've never seen such power in a Pokémon before...{End}
{C1}{Char:0031}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}So, let's see how powerful you really are... Come with me, {Color:31}Dialga{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}So you are a {Color:32}legendary Pokémon{Color:33}... You exude an aura of unmistakable power...{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You are strong... But your strength must be used for the right cause.{End}
{C1}{Char:0012}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:33}Come with me, {Color:31}Mewtwo{Color:33}. I shall lead you on the path of the righteous.{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Oh, wow! This is amazing! So this is the power of a {Color:32}legendary Pokémon{Color:33}, huh?{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Hey, why don't you come with me, {Color:31}Reshiram{Color:33}?! Together, we'll make ourselves famous throughout Ransei!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Ha... So this is {Color:31}Zekrom{Color:33}, the {Color:32}legendary Pokémon{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}So much more powerful than those I have met before...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Come, {Color:31}Zekrom{Color:33}. Accompany me. Show this world your true strength.{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Arceus{Color:33}... So we finally meet. I suppose this means you consider me a worthy partner...{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}But I'm not done yet! I must become even stronger! And you're going to help me, {Color:31}Arceus{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}We're going to be together from now on... We must watch each other's backs!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Arceus{Color:33}... We finally meet. I suppose this means you consider me a worthy partner...{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}But I'm not done yet! I must become even stronger! I hope you'll help me on that quest, {Color:31}Arceus{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0000}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}We're going to be together from now on... Partners on and off the battlefield!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Ha... The {Color:32}legendary Pokémon{Color:33} {Color:31}Rayquaza{Color:33}... Your power is fearsome... I can sense it...{End}

{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:31}Accompany me, {Color:31}Rayquaza{Color:33}! With your great power beside me, Ransei shall be {Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33}'s at last! Hehehe... Hahahahaha!{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Excuse me, |02,50,65{C1}! Someone has come to ask you a favor!{End}

{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Um, I hate to bother you like this, but I didn't know where else to turn... The thing is, I just don't have enough tools to plow my fields. You don't think you could grant me {Turns}{C1} gold to buy new ones, do you?{End}

{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I know it's terribly rude of me to even ask, but I know how generous you are... We were thinking of expanding the farm a little, but we don't have enough money. You wouldn't like to donate {Turns}{C1} gold, would you?{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Why, thank you! I might need some more help in the future, so I'll be sure to call back then!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Why, thank you! I hope you continue to be this generous in the future!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh, right... I'll just have to find some other way...{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What...?! It seems the rumors of your kindness were untrue.{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I hope they will be all right...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You donated {Turns}{C1} gold.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You refused the request.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Very well.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I'm afraid not.{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}How generous of you, |02,50,65{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thank you! I might have to ask you for a little more at some point. I hope you don't mind...{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thank you so much! This should help us make some real progress in those fields.{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thanks! I hope you don't mind if I ask again in the future, either!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Thanks! The farm's going to look just great. You'll see!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh, right... I was really counting on your help, too...{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh. I guess you still don't feel like helping out...{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What?! Surely you can afford to give us a little bit of help!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What?! Are you really turning me down again?!{End}
{C1}{Char:1049}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}There seems to be some sort of commotion outside... Come on, |02,50,65{C1}, let's go take a look.{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,50,65{C1}! We've come to say thank you!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,50,65{C1}! We thought today would be a good day to come by and say thank you!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}We're really grateful for all the support you've given us. Here's just a little something to say thank you. Please, take it!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}All the help you've been giving us... We're really grateful, you know! Here's a little token of our gratitude. Go on―take it!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Items received: |02,64,64{C1}, |02,65,64{C1}, and |02,66,64{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Pokémon's Energy has been restored.{End}
{C1}{Char:1047}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,50,65{C1}... Some people have gathered in front of the castle...{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey, {Name2}{C1}! You're terrible! You never do anything for us!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}You're awful, {Name2}{C1}! Absolutely awful! You never do anything to help us!{End}
{C1}{Char:1051}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}We're very disappointed in you, {Name2}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}What a disappointment you are, {Name2}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}The Pokémon's Energy levels have dropped a little.{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey! You there! Is that some junk you've got there? It is, isn't it?!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Hand over the junk.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Don't hand over the junk.{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey! I'd be more than happy to take it off your hands if you don't need it! I really would!{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Whoa! Thanks! I just love this stuff. It's the feel of it... Its color...{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}It's a work of art! Here, please take this in return. It's the least I can do!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You received {Turns}{C1} gold.{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh no! Really? What a shame. I guess you must be a collector yourself! And here I thought I was the only one! Nice to meet you, fellow junk fan!{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Hey there! It's been a while, hasn't it? Got any junk for me?{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Whoa! Thanks! Here, please take this in return. It's the least I can do!{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh no! Really? What a shame. See you next time then, right?!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Item received: |02,64,64{C1}. {End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,50,65{C1}! I have just returned! Just as you requested, I have brought with me |02,51,65{C1}, |02,52,65{C1}, |02,53,65{C1}, and |02,54,65{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,51,65{C1} is hereby appointed the Guardian of {Color:32}Power{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,52,65{C1} is hereby appointed the Guardian of {Color:32}Wisdom{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,53,65{C1} is hereby appointed the Guardian of {Color:32}Charisma{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,54,65{C1} is hereby appointed the Guardian of {Color:32}Capacity{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The {Color:32}Energy{Color:33} of all four Guardians' Pokémon has increased to the maximum level.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The Four Guardians will not leave your army now, no matter what happens.{End}
{C1}{Char:1025}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}I never noticed that {Name2}{C1}'s army had become so strong...{End}
{C1}{Char:1037}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}We must not be afraid. We must stand up to those stronger than us!{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Yeah! We're supporting you! You've got to show them what you're made of!{End}
{C1}{Char:1025}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}...You're right. We must not wallow in self-pity.{End}
{C1}{Char:1025}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}We'll do this together, everyone! I'll need your help, too, {Color:30}Gabite{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The strength of {Name2}{C1}'s army has increased.{End}
{C1}{Char:0032}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Father! There's someone here to see you, Father!{End}
{C1}{Char:1045}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Forgive my sudden arrival, Lord {Color:31}Tadakatsu{Color:33}. I have something that I must give to you...{End}
{C1}{Char:0031}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}...What is this?{End}

{C1}{Char:1045}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}It is the {Color:32}Warrior Crystal{Color:33}, my lord. It once belonged to a great Warrior... He who holds it is said to be granted a wonderful new power... Lord {Color:31}Tadakatsu{Color:33}... I believe you are the only man worthy of such a powerful item.{End}
{C1}{Char:0032}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}Hm? That old man... He's gone! ...Who on earth was he?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Item received: {Color:32}Warrior Crystal{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Hm...?! What on earth is going on...?!{End}
{C1}{Char:0030}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}I shall go and see, my lord!{End}

{C1}{Char:0030}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}I have just returned, Lord {Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33}. It would appear that the tremor we just felt was as a result of this item falling to Earth somewhere in the mountains...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Is it...?{End}

{C1}{Char:0030}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}All I've heard is rumors, my lord, but I do believe it could be the {Color:32}Conqueror Crystal{Color:33}. It is an object that bestows great power upon its owner...{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}Hehehe... This must be fate. {Color:31}Nobunaga{Color:33} is the chosen one...{End}

{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}It is said that those who bear this crystal have earned the right to meet a {Color:31}legendary Pokémon{Color:33}. I wonder what Pokémon that could be...?{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Item received: {Color:32}Conqueror Crystal{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1046}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1046}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1046}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{End}
{C1}{Char:1049}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,50,65{C1}, it appears that |02,51,65{C1} has a request to make...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Name2}{C1} has set out on a journey.{End}
{C1}{Char:1049}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,50,65{C1} has returned from searching for Pokémon!{End}
{C1}{Char:1049}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I'm glad you enjoyed such success.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Name2}{C1} has returned, accompanied by {Poke}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}We will not lose to |02,51,65{C1}. Come, {Poke}{C1}. Let's make sure we get those {Color:32}banners{Color:33} first!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:33}Well, we ain't losing either! Let's do this, {Poke}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0003}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:33}We can't lose to |02,51,64{C1}! We've got to get those {Color:32}banners{Color:33} first, {Poke}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:30}We shall not be defeated. Come, {Poke}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Name2}{C1}'s Pokémon {Poke}{C1} is now at maximum {Color:32}Energy{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}It is finally time for me to challenge the great man in battle. Are you ready, {Poke}{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:33}We must march forth. Our enemy...is in {Area}{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0001}{NameColor:32}{CharImage:31}Ha... Very well, {Color:31}Mitsuhide{Color:33}. It is time to show {Color:30}Nobunaga{Color:33} what you are capable of!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Mitsuhide{Color:33}'s Pokémon {Poke}{C1} is now at maximum {Color:32}Energy{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1047}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}I bring news... It would appear that enemy forces are readying themselves to face us in battle. We must prepare to face them, |02,51,65{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Enemy forces are rising up against |02,51,64{C1}'s army.{End}
{C1}{Char:1052}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Pull yourself together! We're behind you all the way! Now, take this with you into battle, all right?{End}
{C1}{Char:1036}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}The longer you wait, my friend, the stronger your enemies are going to get. Here, take this.{End}
{C1}{Char:1040}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}You'll be all right, won't you? Please, take this with you onto the battlefield.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Items received: |02,64,64{C1} x 3.{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:31}Hanbei{Color:33} has something to tell you, |02,50,65{C1}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0018}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}What's going on, |02,50,65{C1}? That defeat... It wasn't like you!{End}
{C1}{Char:0018}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Hmm... Maybe this isn't the place for me... What do you think, {Poke}{C1}?{End}
{C1}{Char:0018}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}Yeah... I think I'd better get out of here...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Hanbei{Color:33} has gone off somewhere.{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:31}Hanbei{Color:33} has returned, |02,50,65{C1}!{End}
{C1}{Char:0018}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}Hey there, |02,50,65{C1}! Don't look so surprised! You didn't think I was leaving for good, did you?{End}
{C1}{Char:1039}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Where on earth have you been? What have you been doing?{End}
{C1}{Char:0018}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}Well, things were going badly, weren't they? {Poke}{C1} and I thought we'd better go find some items we could use in battle!{End}
{C1}{Char:0018}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:31}For my dreams of a future in which I can sleep all day, we can't afford to lose anymore! So come on, |02,50,65{C1}. Let's give it everything we've got!{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}{Color:31}Hanbei{Color:33} brought back the following items: {Color:32}Thunderstone{Color:33}, |02,64,64{C1}, and |02,65,64{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:30}{CharImage:30}Your Pokémon's {Color:32}Energy{Color:33} is now at its maximum level.{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}|02,50,65{C1}! Where's {Poke}{C1}...? You're always together! I don't think I've ever seen you apart.{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Oh no... That's terrible... I shall lead the search party personally! ...Oh, but look! It's back! And it's brought something with it!{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{Poke}{C1} knows the depth of your feelings, |02,50,65{C1}! I'm so jealous! What I wouldn't give to be treated like that...{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}{Poke}{C1} has brought you an item: |02,64,64{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1046}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Lord {Color:31}Ieyasu{Color:33}, sir! Something appears to be glowing brightly down in our treasure room.{End}
{C1}{Char:0031}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}What could that be...?{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Hm. I suppose we should go and investigate.{End}
{C1}{Char:1046}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}This crystal seems to be the source of the light.{End}
{C1}{Char:0031}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}This appears to be none other than the famed {Color:32}Unifier Crystal{Color:33}...{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Indeed... I always thought it was a mere legend. This light... Perhaps wearing this crystal will allow me to wield the legendary power... Or perhaps...{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}{End}

{C1}{Char:1046}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}The {Color:32}Unifier Crystal{Color:33} is said to choose its owner. Only one of great strength is said to be worthy. Lord {Color:31}Ieyasu{Color:33}, you would appear to have been chosen...{End}
{C1}{Char:0031}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Indeed. Please, be sure to carry it with you at all times.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Item received: {Color:32}Unifier Crystal{Color:33}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I have information to report! A previously unseen Pokémon has been spotted in a certain {Color:32}Cave{Color:33}!{End}
{C1}{Char:1048}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Word is, it seems incredibly powerful! I wonder what kind of Pokémon it could be...{End}
{C1}{Char:0033}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:34}How interesting! I think I'd better go take a look.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}It seems something is inhabiting the {Color:32}Cave{Color:33} in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}Greetings! Have I got news for you! A short while ago, I caught a glimpse of an astonishingly beautiful Pokémon soaring in the sky!{End}
{C1}{Char:1053}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I could sense an aura of unworldly power! This is no ordinary Pokémon, I'm telling you!{End}
{C1}{Char:0007}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}This sounds interesting... We should go take a look.{End}
{C1}{Char:9999}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}An {Color:32}Icy Peak{Color:33} has appeared in {Area}{C1}.{End}
{C1}{Char:0017}{NameColor:31}{CharImage:30}Hm! My crystal... It is glowing... Could this be...?{End}
{C1}{Char:1046}{NameColor:33}{CharImage:30}I have information to report. A small shrine has suddenly appeared in a cave in {Area}{C1}.{End}
